Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race.`` I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. . Two months after Barack Obama signed a law that will lead to the repeal of don't ask, don't tell, Donald Rumsfeld told ABC News Radio the nation is ready for open service. First of all, we know that gays and lesbians have been serving in the military for decades with honorable service, Donald Rumsfeld said.`` We know that[ repeal of a ban on gays serving openly] is an idea whose time has come.'' not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012. Mike Pence ruled out a White House bid in a letter sent to supporters that also fueled speculation he is instead planning a run for governor. We have been especially humbled by the confidence and support of those who believe we should pursue the presidency, but after much deliberation and prayer, we believe our calling is closer to home, Mike Pence wrote in the letter.`` In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana.'' Before joining Google a decade ago, Eric Schmidt served as an exec at computer networking maker Novell( NOVL) and Sun Microsystems, which is now owned by Oracle( ORCL). My estimate is that Eric Schmidt likes to be in the game. He likes to be a player, said Roger Kay . It's unlikely Eric Schmidt will retire with his billions, taking up sailing or traveling. Indeed, there's a rumor he's trying to land a gig on cable television.
